projects.title: Calculator
projects.shortDescription: A simple calculator, which I built from scratch
projects.learnedDuring: Javascript Eval function, click events and DOM-Manipulation
projects.inspiration: after learning HTML, CSS and JS, i wanted to build my first web-app from scratch. My focus should be on the calculation function and to display the output on to the DOM.

projects.title: Todoay
projects.shortDescription: get it done Today! - ToDo List
projects.learnedDuring: creating DOM elemtents and adding them to the page, simple web-navigation and displaying date & time
projects.challenges: working with arrays and filtering data
projects.inspiration: as i worked a lot during my studies and work life with a variety of to-do lists, i wanted to create a multi-page web-app, with task that can be added, updated and finished

projects.title: Quotes
projects.shortDescription: a quote generator with style settings
projects.learnedDuring: CSS manipulation through JS, moving elements and using of an API
projects.challenges: Font change on selection, resetting styles and displaying API response content
projects.inspiration: This project was a group project from Mimo Dev. Our user story was to integrate an API call and display the data response, everything else was up to us. I decided to keep the focus on changeable styling and to integrate pagination in our API call, to access all of the 50'000+ quotes, which are available.

projects.title: Countries of the World
projects.shortDescription: a simple ReactJS API interface to get infos about countries
projects.learnedDuring: storing data from API in state and deleting items after comparing data
projects.challenges: remodeling from functional to class react component, passing down data to child components and manipulating state from different component, but keeping one single source of state/truth
projects.inspiration: using this open API to showcase my learned react skills

projects.title: There'll be Games
projects.shortDescription: a more complex ReactJS & API project about video games
projects.learnedDuring: React router, navigation in react & navivation and working along the URL
projects.challenges: side-ways scrolling, dragging as scroll, navigation, manipulation different states and bringing data together from seperate API calls
projects.inspiration: Gaming was always a passion of mine and this small appreciation to video games is a way of combining two passions.

projects.title: ShelfTec
projects.learnedDuring: Login authentification, building the back-end API for the products and publishing back-end
projects.challenges: Building a back-end from scratch and sharing data through api call on the backend
projects.inspiration: Since i earn my own money, i bought all my tech-stuff at 'Digitec.ch'. Their website and design was always giving me a 'home-like' feeling, which i wanted to achieve for project. At first i wanted to use a public API, but the range of product was not satisfying, so i had to build my own API for this.
